Package controllers

Class EditSubscriberDetailsController

java.lang.Object
controllers.EditSubscriberDetailsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientAware
public class EditSubscriberDetailsController extends Object implements ClientAware
Controller for editing a subscriberג€™s personal details. Locked fields (cannot be edited): subscriber code, ID, username. Editable fields: first name, last name, phone number, email, password.

      private static boolean isValidPhone(String phone)

      Returns:
      true if phone number format is valid
